cvt_V792_data Struct Reference

V792 board data structure. More...

#include <cvt_V792.h>

Data Fields

cvt_board_data m_common_data
CVT_QTP_TYPES m_type
UINT32 * m_queue
long m_queue_ini
long m_queue_end

Detailed Description

V792 board data structure.

This structure stores any board data, common and specific ones. It must be passed to each V792's API

Definition at line 75 of file cvt_V792.h.

Field Documentation

cvt_board_data cvt_V792_data::m_common_data

Boards common data structure: always let at offset 0

UINT32* cvt_V792_data::m_queue

Builtin read data queue: only if CVT_V792_USE_DATA_QUEUE is defined

Definition at line 83 of file cvt_V792.h.

Referenced by cvt_V792_close(), and cvt_V792_open().

long cvt_V792_data::m_queue_end

Builtin read data queue top offset: new data can be stored from queue_end to queue_ini (only if CVT_V792_USE_DATA_QUEUE is defined)

Definition at line 85 of file cvt_V792.h.

long cvt_V792_data::m_queue_ini

Builtin read data queue bottom offset: valid data can be peeked from queue_ini to queue_end. (only if CVT_V792_USE_DATA_QUEUE is defined)

Definition at line 84 of file cvt_V792.h.

The QTP board type
